channel.title: Using any stairs doens't load map correctly. Rep++
channel.description:
Okay so when I click on these stairs in the Slayer Tower: [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/23ku7as.png[/img]
It correctly sends me upstairs to the next level however, it doesn't load the upstairs walls, floor, ceiling, etc; shows the map as being blank; but loads all the NPC's for level 2 correctly.
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/wkssut.png[/img]
[b] Any ideas on how to fix this error? I will rep++ for any help!
[/b]

item.title: Using any stairs doens't load map correctly. Rep++
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

Explisionist:

Eh its pretty tough to say, some times its client side, and others it could be just the server doesn’t have the memory for the level 2 bases… Have you tried going upstairs any where else?

Yes, it does this at all stairs throughout the server.

Read full topic
item.source: Using any stairs doens't load map correctly. Rep++
